website_summaries.verdict: While on the heavy side, this axe can handle a variety of tough jobs involving large rocks and tree roots.
pros: Superior build with a 5-pound total weight
Features a wide head with a semi-sharp trowel on one end
Wooden handle (36 inches) is treated with a “poly” guard to minimize shock from overstriking
cons: Some may find this option to be a bit too heavy and bulky

customer_reviews.title: Worst Mattock I've Ever Used. Lasted less than one day in the field
customer_reviews.text: I build singletrack trail for a living and this mattock is the worst I've ever used. After bench-cutting and rooting for a few hours the grubbing end of the tool bent inward and the handle snapped.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Sanders

customer_reviews.title: a beast get this one
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awsome it will go through rock ice roots and more ... my story. Me and my dad were in the snow storm jonas and my dad thought it was a good idea to pull out his 14 ton truck in 20 inches of snow . We got stuck in the road on ice and my dad said go get your pick. That thing went through ice like a hot knife through butter and my dad swears that pick saved him and that was the best thing i ever got . Hope this helped
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Solid- Go to work
customer_reviews.text: Recently started some yard work and needed a heavy duty tool to remove some old bushes. This served the purpose beautifully. Has nice weight and balance so it is easy to handle for extended periods of time. Took care of the yard in no time.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: hi ho hi ho hi ho
customer_reviews.text: Seems very well made. Handle is a very stout piece, I can get a really powerful swing with this as it's well balanced and the weight is perfect. I don't think it'll break any time soon but if it does I'll update.
customer_reviews.author: Pirate_Joke

customer_reviews.title: If you have muscle.
customer_reviews.text: This is a little heavier than I thought it would be and it is very dull when you get it leaving it up to you to either sharpen it or get it sharpened.
customer_reviews.author: Bandit Walden

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This mattock is heavy duty and the handle is strong. Busts through rock and breaks up hard compacted soil with ease. I don't know how I lived without it for so long.
customer_reviews.author: Horse

customer_reviews.title: This is a good one!
customer_reviews.text: This one is a high quality tool for some heavy slamming impact... better one than most at this great price! I would recommend this one if you are looking for something that will last awhile instead of the head flying off or the handle breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Peterson

customer_reviews.title: amazon: my chore concierge.
customer_reviews.text: Full size mattock, delivered to my door. Does the job, keeps me away from Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: city mouse country mouse

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time and well packed. I have used this product for at least two weeks now and did not find anything wrong with. This pick performs well on all types of grounds from top soil to rocky soil.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer 99

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality tool, better than the models available at the local home improvement stores.
customer_reviews.author: DSP

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a good heavy duty pick and mattock at a very good price. I used it to remove large roots from my yard.
customer_reviews.author: Bon

customer_reviews.title: Heavy digging!
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the quality of this product and the price! I recommend this product to anyone that has a use for a pick axe with the intention of heavy duty digging.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty. Durable, strong, reliable and well made. A must have for gardening!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pick mattock. I used it to break apart rocks, stones, dirt, tree trunks, etc. it is strong and holes up well. I couldn't get the job done without it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Choi

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality
customer_reviews.text: Carl Johnson - I searched through all the various hardware stores for a Pick Mattock with a hardwood handle and did not find any that appeared to be built "tough" enough for my application. This tool is of high quality and will undoubtedly last for many years. I will recommend Amazon to my friends for top quality tools. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Johnson

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: This pick mattock is kick as..#$. My husband really love it. He actually returned the cheapo one that he bought at home depot. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: works great so far
customer_reviews.text: I have not put this to the test yet, only light duty work. I needed something to pull out stumps and roots from plants in the yard. The design of the head is great for this purpose.
customer_reviews.author: mille35

customer_reviews.title: great tool
customer_reviews.text: toprated tool works AAA+++ very good for tilling or leveling projects Highly recomend a good investment if you need to use a mattock
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Montemorano

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: This tool is awesome. I returned the one I got from Lowes once I saw this one. This tool is a must for the DIY landscaper.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Soild mattock, I've used it regularly for the last 6 months and it shows no signs if slowing down.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Scott Uhler

product_meta.title: Truper 31615 5-Pound Pick Mattock with 36-Inch Wood Handle
product_meta.description: Truper 31615 5-Pound Pick Mattock with 36-Inch Wood Handle
feature_bullets: Handle has shock absorbent "poly" guard to protect against overstrike damage
Picks through hard pan soil, cuts small shrub roots, chews up stubborn soil
Stock up on quality truper tools for other projects today

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars36 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
